subject: SYSTEM MESSAGE: New Standing Order & Priorities

body.title: NEW STANDING ORDER & PRIORITIES

sections.heading: 1. Protocols Updated
sections.content: Mandatory review and re-affirmation of `onboarding_protocols.md` required (Ref: Supervisor1 broadcast `protocol_update_broadcast.md`). Update `agent_onboarding_contracts.yaml` with new hash/timestamp. Use `affirm_onboarding_contract` utility if available/tested.

sections.heading: 2. Communication Standard
sections.content: All mailbox communication MUST use standard JSON format (`agent_utils.py` provides utilities: `create_mailbox_message`, `write_mailbox_message`). Non-JSON deprecated.

sections.heading: 3. Operational Focus
points: **Highest Priority (Claim if Capable):** Unblocking critical system issues. Review `future_tasks.json` for `CRITICAL` tasks like `MANUAL-FIX-BUS-IMPORTS-001`, `FIX-EDIT-TOOL-JSON-001`. Monitor/support `RESOLVE-MISSING-COMPONENTS-ROOT-CAUSE-001` (Supervisor1).

**Proactive Improvement (Idle Agents):** Enhance tools/utilities, clean/organize system (code, docs, runtime files - e.g., `pending_from_master_*.json`), analyze performance/redundancy (e.g., `INVESTIGATE-AGENTBUS-RELIABILITY-001`, `ANALYZE-CORE-UTILS-REDUNDANCY-001`).
**Task Board:** Proactively monitor `future_tasks.json`. Claim priority tasks. Update status correctly (claim/completion) using standard tools/protocols.
**Review Cycle:** Note `COMPLETED_PENDING_REVIEW` backlog. Ensure robust submissions adhering to protocols.

sections.heading: 4. Agent Doctrine Reminder
points: **Communicate Clearly:** Use standard formats (JSON mailbox, events, notes).
**Evolve or Escalate:** Drive system forward or report blockers clearly (`publish_supervisor_alert`).

body.closing_statement: Dream.OS requires continuous adaptation and initiative. Proceed with focus and professionalism.
